Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: A total of 100 ( 0 . 9 % ) patients developed postoperative convulsive seizures .

| --- |
| postoperative convulsive seizures |

Explanation:

In the given paragraph, the disease entity is "postoperative convulsive seizures". This is a medical condition where a patient experiences seizures after undergoing a surgical procedure.
